name: Flittle
flavorText: Flittle’s toes levitate about half an inch above the ground because of the psychic power emitted from the frills on the Pokémon’s belly.

previous.name: Rabsca
previous.flavorText: The body that supports the ball barely moves. Therefore, it is thought that the true body of this Pokémon is actually inside the ball.

next.name: Espathra
next.flavorText: It immobilizes opponents by bathing them in psychic power from its large eyes. Despite its appearance, it has a vicious temperament.
